Literature.Title: Self-Assembling Antimicrobial Peptides with Intrinsic UV-Visible Spectral Fluorescence upon Single Amino Acid Substitution from Arginine to Citrulline
Literature.Author: Nazeer N, Ghimire A, Rainey J, Lubell W, Ahmed M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(IC50=73.6µM),Bacillus subtilis(IC50=89.2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(IC50=48.8µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(20-30% Cytotoxicity=100µM)
